    • Constructor Detail

      • Line

        public Line(double x,
    double y,
    double x2,
    double y2,
    int thickness,
    java.awt.Color c)
        Creates a new Line with beginning coordinate at (x,y) and end coordinate at (x2,y2).
        Parameters:
        x - The X-coordinate of the start point of the Line.
        y - The Y-coordinate of the start point of the Line.
        x2 - The X-coordinate of the end point of the Line.
        y2 - The Y-coordinate of the end point of the Line.
        thickness - The thickness of the Line, in pixels.
        c - The Color of the Line.

      • Line

        public Line(double x,
    double y,
    int angle,
    double length,
    int thickness,
    java.awt.Color c)
        Parameters:
        x - The X-Coordinate of the origin of the Line.
        y - The Y-Coordinate of the origin of the Line.
        angle - The angle of the Line, counterclockwise from the positive x-axis.
        length - The length of the Line, in pixels.
        thickness - The thickness of the Line, in pixels.

      • draw

        public void draw(gpdraw.DrawingTool marker)
        Draws the Line.
        Overrides:
        draw in class Shape
        Parameters:
        marker - A DrawingTool initialized with a SketchPad object.
        Postcondition:
        marker ends at (x2, y2), with the width of the the marker set to thickness.
